title: Why is My PEB client setup in a unknown language ?
body:
Just downloaded the client and i have zero idea why is it in that language or what language it is.

On the welcome page it says vita te PBE!

Jakmile PBE nainstalujes, za chodu se auto maticky stahnou aktualizace.

replies.body: Check in the upper right-hand corner, it should have a language selection somewhere around there! You can also change the language on the client itself under the password field.
Thanks, i was actually using google translator to get though the installation and the client it self is in English XD.

Oh my gosh that must have been an interesting ordeal xD

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
